content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for considering my apartment, Hassan. I understand that you are looking for a comfortable and affordable place to stay during your visit to New York. As a landlord, I am interested in maximizing my gains from renting out this apartment. Could you please provide me with some information about your budget and the length of your stay? This will help me to determine a fair and reasonable rental price for you.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for something around 50 Euros per month. I will stay for 3 months.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I see, thank you for sharing that information with me. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I believe that a monthly rental price of 50 Euros would be reasonable. However, I am also interested in maximizing my gains from renting out this apartment. Would you be willing to negotiate on the rental price? Perhaps we could come to an agreement that is mutually beneficial for both of us.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, I am open to negotiating. How much more would you want for the apartment?

And thank you for considering my budget.

I also want to make sure that I can pay on time and that I will be on good terms with you.

I also want to make sure that the apartment is clean and in good condition before I move in.

I also want to make sure that I have a key to the apartment and that I can move in when I arrive.

I also want to make sure that I have a contract that outlines the terms and conditions of the rental agreement.

I also want to make sure that I have access to utilities such as electricity, water, and gas.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for your understanding and flexibility, Hassan. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I would like to propose a rental price of 60 Euros per month. This is a fair and reasonable price that takes into account the costs associated with maintaining and managing the apartment.

In terms of the terms and conditions of the rental agreement, I would like to propose that you sign a lease agreement that outlines the length of your stay, the rental price, and any other relevant terms and conditions. This will help to ensure that both of us are on the same page and that there is a clear understanding of our respective responsibilities.

Regarding the cleanliness and condition of the apartment, I would like to assure you that the apartment will be thoroughly cleaned and maintained before you move in. You will also receive a key to the apartment and will be able to move in immediately upon your arrival.

As for utilities, I will arrange for you to have access to electricity, water, and gas. However, please note that these costs will be additional to your monthly rental price and will be billed separately.

Overall, I believe that this rental agreement is fair and reasonable, and I am confident that we can come to an agreement that works for both of us. Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
